posts.title: 博客的下一步计划
posts.text: 尝试使用hugo hugo有一个很不错的主题站 https://wowchemy.com/templates/ 参考链接 https://blog.laoda.de/archives/blog-choosing.html https://wowchemy.com/templates/ 搭建： https://sspai.com/post/59904 不错的案例： https://yikang.site/

posts.title: 5月29
posts.text: 开始重新写。 提示： 备份的方法是 git checkout 一个新的branch 然后 git add . 最后 1git push --set-upstream origin newbackup 这样就会有一个新的branch出现在远程 一些常见操作： tags和类别 https://linlif.github.io/2017/05/27/Hexo%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E6%94%BB%E7%95%A5-%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E5%88%86%E7%B1%BB%E5%8F%8A%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE/

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
